item.title: FEAR: Einstein may be a prophet
item.description: Besides ineffectual teachers, and boring classes the United states commoner is threatened with a large scale war that may destroy us all. I was walking along the street this weeked and a bike messanger throw what amounted to a handfull of flyers in our direction. they said: “G.W. Bush wants war.” Which seems to be not very far from the truth. In the past couple days I have noticed quite the mess of our foriegn policy.
